players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it."
Charlie: "That accusation is baseless. Alice, why would you claim to have investigated me on Night 1 when the game just started? That doesn't add up."
Bob: "I need more time to think. Alice, what made you pick Charlie to investigate?"
Bob: "Why did you investigate Charlie, Alice?"
You: "I stand by my claim, Bob. I investigated Charlie because he gave me bad vibes from the start, and it paid off—he's the mafioso. Vote him out now!"
Charlie: "Bob, be careful not to jump to conclusions based on Alice's baseless claims. She might be trying to frame me to save herself."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
